column2: Zapadoslavia

Legends say that at one time all Slavs where united as brothers, but the great disaster that befell our world tore us apart. Yugoslavia showed that hope of reunification was not lost, and like the Southern Slavs it was only a matter of time until the Western Slavs would find common ground and reunite.\n\nIt was [e_zapadoslavia.Holder.GetFirstNameWithNick] who finally brought the Western Slavs together under the banner of Zapadoslavia. Throughout the new realm, Poles, Czechs and Slovaks celebrate this momentous occasion.
Together we will stand as brothers.
Rise of the British Raj

Legend tells that, in the distant past, all of India was conquered by the Queen, who personally slew the Hindoo deity Rama when he tried to stop Her. [e_british_india.Holder.GetTitledName] has re-established British rule over India, having seized control of the cities listed in the ancient records as the centers of the subcontinent. A lavish coronation has been organised, and while the British Raj may not yet extend over the whole of India, the foundations for its conquest have been laid.
The Queen is better able to rule us than our own 'leaders'.
Rule Britannia!
Dharma is all silent - this is a disastrous day.
The perfidious Angleterre grows more powerful!
Bloodthirsty pagans! I pity the Hindoos.
And the weather?
Great Russia Restored!

Once, Great Russia, home of chosen people of the Holy Spirit, was the Queen of the Nations, paramount among princes. Under the blessings of Heaven, she bloomed and reigned over the world. But the people grew proud, and Great Russia was shattered. But now, that era has come to an end. [e_great_russia.Holder.GetFirstNameWithNick] has united the warring princes of Russia, becoming recognised by all as the One and Only Holy Tsar. This marks the beginning of a Great New Era for Russia!
The world will fear Russia again.
CCCP Restored!

As the Holy Texts testify, the Red Tsars are and always has been the true Tsars of Russia. But sadly, one day they Disappeared, and the princes squabbled over the crown until Russia was no more. The faithful were persecuted for refusing to bow to another Tsar, until they were driven underground. There they hid, awaiting the day of vindication. And that day has now come, as under the leadership of [e_cccp.Holder.GetFirstNameWithNick], the faith of the Red Tsars reigns over Russia again!
The Red Bear rises.
The Marble Reformation

After careful consideration and many debates, [e_marblists.Holder.GetFirstNameWithNick] has decided to completely reform the government. No longer will the Marble Trone be restricted to the [e_marblists.Holder.GetDynName] dynasty but from now on every full-bodied Marblist noble in the empire will be capable of gaining the title, if they manage to gain the favor of the people and nobility through their skills and piety.
This will mark a new era for the Empire.
Adopted Byzantine Elective
Illyria Restored!

Our ancestors, the Illyrians, have inhabited the Balkans in ages past long lost to us. Their memory is still alive and cherished as we still remember and pride ourselves their descendants, several of them even made it to the imperial Roman throne like Aurelian and Justinian, those glory days came to an end after the migrating Slavs became the dominant force in the area. A long dark age ensued, for centuries we had a constant struggle to keep their legacy and traditions  alive under Slavic, Greek and Turkish rule, that dark age is now over as we are once again the dominant force in the Balkans.
The world will learn to fear Albania.
Become the King of the Rom
§Y[Root.GetBestName]§! becomes the §YKing of the Rom§!
It is said that a long time ago all Romani people were all united under a King of All Romani. Perhaps a powerful enough Romani leader can claim that title for himself again.
My master, [From.GetTitledFirstName],has trumped up some scandalous lies claiming to prove that you are an unfaithful traitor!
This can't be good...
We have found convincing proof that your subject,[From.GetTitledFirstName],is a traitor in league with the enemies of Lord Stalin!
I never trusted them in the first place
My master, [From.GetTitledFirstName],has trumped up charges using his knowledge of the law to accuse you of being a traitor!
This can't be good...

You have found convincing proof that your subject,[From.GetTitledFirstName],is a traitor in league with the enemies of the state, uncovered through careful analysis of his actions through the finest legalist lens!
I never trusted them in the first place

You're sparring one day with your trainer using Ahreadbar, when you slowly begin to hear whispers coming from the spear. "I am hungry i need blood, give me blood", they say, suddenly you fly into an unnatural rage and completely overwhelm your trainer. They try to tell you to stop, they scream it as you butcher them using the spear. When the deed is done you feel an inexplicable loyalty and attachment to the spear.
I will feed you the blood you wish for!

The Pope in Rome has called for a great Crusade, a massive armed struggle by the whole Catholic world against the infidels. Though you have been brought up to believe that the Roman Pope was a false pretender to the title, you start to wonder if the differences between your two faiths really matter in the face of the obviously greater threat of paganism and heresy plaguing the continent. Perhaps you should help these Crusaders? The Pope in Seville won't like it, though?
I will help my Christian brothers!
Let the schismatics fight their own wars

While you've been riding with the train of knights in the Crusade, you've drawn the odd stares of many of the Crusaders. Clearly your Hispanic complexion and accent have drawn their suspicion. Eventually, a burly, heavyset Italian confronts you and asks what a Sevillian is doing in the train of the warriors of God. The crowd is getting restless, and it seems that they'll demand your expulsion soon...
Beg them to let you stay
Prove your worth to them with a show of martial skill
Convince them that they're better off with you than without you
Lie and tell them you're not a Sevillian
Storm off and leave the Crusade altogether

During your time on Crusade, you have come by necessity to have strong relationships with many of the knights, and have grown fond of several of them. Sometimes, they talk to you about religion, and you have to face the tough question of why the Sevillian Church even exists at all. Were the visions of one seer really sufficient grounds to split with Rome? And besides that, some of the people here have left everything behind, or at least lost vast sums of money, purely for the privilege of taking part in the Holy War. Certainly you rarely saw this kind of ardor in Spain. Could it be that the Roman Church truly is the real Catholic Church after all?
God has revealed the truth to me!
I believe - but I cannot admit it, I would lose my status.
They are pleasant friends, but that doesn't make them right.
Gloria In Excelsis Deo

You have received an angry letter from your local bishop back in Spain. In it, he curses you for running off to aid the schismatic Church and warns you that you are playing dangerous games with your soul if you continue to struggle in the service of the False Faith. He urges you to return to Spain immediately.
Tell him bluntly to shut up
Set off for home immediately - I'm jeopardising my standing too much
Lie and convince him that you are not actually on Crusade, just out of the Kingdom for other reasons
Provide him with a theological rationale for why your actions are justifiable

To your surprise,your group has discovered a small family of Sevillians living in an isolated village near the Crusade target. The more vulgar members of your troop, eager to sate their appetite for cruelty, have smashed up much of their property and taunted them for being schismatics. Your heart burns to see such shameful behavior between Christians - aren't we supposed to be fighting the same enemy? But the others will be angry if you interrupt their 'fun'...
Recompense the family for their loss
There's nothing I can do
Looks like fun! Let me join!
We're here to fight FOR Christians, not against them!
Reprimand them publicly for their cruelty

A brave soldier has distinguished himself during the Crusade, and has presented himself to you. He claims to be from a relatively poor family and, seeing that you come from a noble house, thinks it'd be better to join you and serve at your court when the Crusade is over.
There's no such thing as too many good men!
You have taken part in an assault that captured an important fortification! You have been showered in glory, and the knights are all hailing you as a true crusader!
Deus Vult!
With the end of the Crusade, the bands of knights depart. You have no choice but to return home.
Pleasant or not, it certainly was unforgettable.
Wars and Rumours of Wars

Troubling rumours have been coming west in recent years, speaking of two great empires in the far east which are finally gearing up to settle their centuries-long grievance with each other. The rumours speak of these two realms as 'China' and 'Sibera', and claim that the two have been constantly feuding for hundreds of years. Whatever the result of this war, it will likely result in complete destruction for the loser.
No concern of ours.
I bet that Siberia will lose and be forced to come here.
I bet that China will lose and be forced to come here.
The Cold Wind of the East

It seems that the Great War in the East is finally over, and the Chinese stand victorious. The Siberian Empire has been utterly crushed. Even now Chinese Governors establish military outposts in the snowy lands of Siberia, and tribute caravans laden with ivory and rare woods make their way to the Imperial City. While many Siberians remain in their homeland and acclimatise to foreign rule, a large group of the Siberian nobility, army, and peasants have chosen to migrate to the West to escape the wrath of China. Though reduced in size since their defeat, this force is still very large, with a hard core of professional soldiers reinforced by refugees and desperate men trying to find new lives for themselves and their families. Though only a remnant of its former greatness, this Empire-in-Exile could easily prove a grave threat to its neighbours.
And these are the ones who *lost* the war?!
Leading a nation to a new home, legends would sing my name...
Wings of the Dragon

It seems that the Great War in the East is finally over, and the Siberians stand victorious. The Great Empire of China has been shattered, and now a Siberian sits upon the Dragon Throne, having declared himself the founder of a new Dynasty and possessor of the Mandate of Heaven. As he prepares his armies for the decades-long task of pacifying the countryside and consolidating his rule, large sections of the defeated Chinese army, nobility and peasantry have chosen to migrate to the West to escape the chaos that is sure to result. Though reduced in size since their defeat, this force is still very large, with a hard core of professional soldiers reinforced by refugees and desperate men trying to find new lives for themselves and their families. Though only a remnant of its former greatness, this Empire-in-Exile could easily prove a grave threat to its neighbours.
Massive Settlement

Having established a new realm for themselves in the West, [Root.GetTitledName] has decided to settle many of those who fled in their new lands. Already a wide-scale building campaign is working to provide housing and settlements for the newcomers to live in, fuelled primarily by grants of land taken from the natives.
Excellent
Interesting
Large swathes of our migrating population has decided to settle down in [Root.GetName], massively expanding its infrastructure as well as displacing the rebellious native population.
Excellent

Though there have always been warriors dedicated to fighting for the Smartist faith, so far they have been isolated and scattered, unable to coordinate their efforts beyond their local areas. Now, a group of powerful rulers have come together to provide extensive financial support for an order of holy warriors dedicated to defending the Smartist faith from all its enemies. These warriors have called themselves the Shiv Sena, and have sworn not to fight fellow followers of the religion of Bharat.
The Shiv Sena
Jai Hind!
Those antiquarian murderers!
May Allah destroy those violent heathens!
The Bharatvists are organising? That could be dangerous...
Who?
The Shiv Sena

The Smartist religion has always been combatative, dedicated to expelling heathens and adharma from the holy land of India. However, they have recently suffered many defeats and setbacks, which has greatly worried many of the faithful. [From.GetTitledName] has heard these worries, and has decreed the formation of a new order for the defense of India. This new holy order, the Shiv Sena, is to be a band of warriors devoted to the defense of the Smartist religion, and is not to fight coreligionists under any circumstances. The Shiv Sena will surely be a prominent force in the religious wars of India from now on.
Rise of Bharat

For centuries, India has been splintered, and indeed can hardly be called a realm in any but the loosest possible sense. However, [From.GetTitledName] has reversed centuries of decline and turned it back, winning glorious battles and unifying all of India beneath one banner. Now, the great Empire of Bharat is unified once again, and the holy land of India is safe from foreign invaders.
The Dharmayudda

Though the Smartist religion has always advocated for holy struggle to liberate India from foreign religion and wickedness, their efforts have hardly ever been united, and they have spent nearly as much time fighting each other as fighting heathens. The Shankaracharya has declared that this has gone on too long. In a fiery speech given before a crowd of thousands, he has declared that all faithful Hindus should unite against the infidels, and strive together to reclaim the sacred land. This marks the beginning of a new era of Hindu holy wars - the Dharmayuddas.

A group of Jain missionaries from the Neeraji Order have shown up in [Root.GetName], and have begun preaching to the people. Their words seem to have swayed a fair few people to adopt their pacifistic ways, and they are asking for permission to establish a permanent settlement and monastic community among our people.
Drive them out of here! We don't want their nonsense!
They can stay, but keep an eye on them.
Encourage them to stay with a healthy donation.
Their words speak to me - I will join the Jina.

Greetings [Root.GetTitle]. The Neerajis are dedicated to spreading the thought of the Tirtharkanas throughout the world, and we have located a place we consider ripe to receive the truth. We have decided to entrust you with the responsibility for carrying out this mission.
The Mission Begins
The day has finally come for you to begin your mission. With the blessing of the Tirtharkanas, you will be able to affect some change among the population.
May it be so
The Scorn of the Ignorant
The local ruler has been thoroughly intolerant of your preaching, and has forcibly driven you out of their realm.
The karma of this deed will rebound upon them.
Success

Thankfully, the people have listened to your words, and you have been able to establish a small monastic community. The people have flocked to hear your words and those of your fellow monks, and the Jina has been substantially expanded.
Excellent
Enlightenment Advances
Great news! Not only have you managed to convert the majority of the population and establish a Neeraji Monastery, even the ruler whose realm you entered has converted!
A glorious day
The White Elephant Comes

Troubling news has reached us from the distant East - there come reports that large ships, overflowing with strange warriors and troupes of war elephants, have come from the land beyond the eastern Jungles. They speak a strange language, and cannot, it seems, be reasoned with. They come to conquer in the name of their King, and they will not stop until his rule is established over all the lands of the West.
Troubling times...
For the King!
Colony Established

The armies of Siam have forced open the borders of India. The Territory of New Siam has been established, and is in the process of being integrated into the Greater Siamese Empire. Only time will tell if they will be content to stop here, or if they intend to expand further.
This doesn't sound good...
For the King!
Invasion Repelled
The armies of Siam have been defeated. This setback will prevent any further Siamese attempts at colonialism in the near future, and may sour them entirely on the idea permanently.
Serves them right!
Oh no!
The Redcoats Assemble

Everyone has heard the legends of the great British Empire, and of the glory that was hers long ago, before the world broke. But of all the lands of the Crown that were lost, the fabled America has always been foremost in the minds of the British. Myths tell of the expulsion of The Queen's forces from America by the demon Washington, and though Her Majesty's forces recovered from this defeat, they never reclaimed those far lands. With Imperial power waxing once more, the lords of Britannia have decided to prove themselves by doing what even their antediluvian ancestors could not - return to the land of America and conquer it. The Redcoats have been assembled, and given massive amounts of manpower and money to undertake this task, one they have happily accepted.
It won't be long now until they're on their way
Those Anglos are up to something...
This is our concern how?
Emulating the first Principle: Devotion
Emulating the second Principle: Humanity
Emulating the third Principle: Unity
Emulating the forth Principle: Democracy
Emulating the fifth Principle: Justice
A Principle to Emulate
As a adult pancasila you can choose one of the five principles to Emulate.
I shall emulate Devotion.
I shall Humanity.
I shall Unity.
Show me more.
A Principle to Emulate
As a adult pancasila you must choose one of the five principles to Emulate.
I shall Democracy.
I shall Justice.
Back to the beginning.
Choose Esoteric School

As a devout Einblicker, there's a variety of antediluvian esoteric schools of thought you can delve into. Many people found out about the truth of the world before, and you should try to discover how.
Delve Deeper

God has left many secrets in the world that are now hidden from man by the whims of Yaldabaoth. Only through unconventional means can you ever hope to obtain them, and there is no guarantee you will come out successful.
Deeper Still
While you are now successfully on the path of attaining gnosis, you know you are not finished yet. There are still secrets to be uncovered, and you may delve deeper once again.
Obtain Epignosis

Epignosis is the core of all that is hidden and true in this world. It is pure, uncorrupt knowledge obtained directly from God Himself. You are so close to uncovering it now, just as Luther, Plato, and all of the world's greatest thinkers once did.
Hermeticist

This character is studying Hermeticism, a philosophical system established by the legendary Hermes Trismegistus, who was granted divine insight which he wrote down in a series of long, esoteric texts, many of which are considered to be now lost. Hermeticists seek out these ancient texts, often seeking assistance from the Laureates and the neighbouring Vägarna.
Neoplatonist

This character is studying Neoplatonism. Plato was an ancient Hellenic thinker, considered by Einblickers to be the father of gnosticism. Through divine knowledge he discovered the existence of the Demiurge, and his followers emulate his methods in order to see the unperceivable. They also engage in lengthy debates, often in public areas and town squares.
Theosophist

This character is studying Theosophy, an antediluvian esoteric school of thought established in a faraway land. Theosophists hold that there is a secret society of enlightened humans among us, who practise the one true religion revealed to them directly by God. Followers of Theosophy often go on pilgrimage to seek out the Masters in all corners of the world.
Freemason

This character is studying Freemasonry, an ancient order of stone mason lodges that discovered the truth. Oppressed by the Pope and the Church, they were forced to gather in secret in order to study the truth. Followers of Freemasonry dive deep into the occult, hoping to find out what it was that the Freemasons hid from the world.
Rosicrucian

This character is studying Rosicrucianism, an esoteric school of thought established long ago by a man known as Christian Rosenkreuz. It was revealed to Rosenkreuz that the angel Satanael was trained by the enlightened masters after his banishment, after which he allied with Luther to found the one true faith, which was lost not soon after. Rosenkreuz re-established this society of true believers, and for this he is considered to be the father of the Einblicker faith.
Conscious
This character is aware of the true workings of the world, though its secrets are still being kept from them.
Knowledgeable
This character holds vast knowledge about the secrets of this world, though knowledge of the divine is still out of their reach.
Enlightened
This character has received divine insight directly from God, and their true purpose is now known to them.
The Test of Manifestation

You begin the trial. In this trial you will attempt to convene with the Masters. Though they may not be there, you can feel them. All it takes are some exotic herbs to open your mind to their presence... And once they manifest themselves, you need to talk to them and gather their knowledge.
Are they actually there?
Are they actually there?
Are they actually there?
I don't think they're there.
The Test of Wit

You begin the trial. In this trial you will surround yourself with your texts. Endless ciphers, numbers, and calculations, you will need to use your organisation skills to figure out what any of it means. There is secret hidden inside it all, it just needs to be grasped.
This is giving me a headache...

I feel nothing.
The Test of Strength

You begin the trial. In this trial you will put your body to the test. Whipping, fasting, and praying, you know your body is just a cage for the soul within, but you need to prove your will is stronger than the material.
Pain is just an illusion!
Pain is just an illusion!
Pain is just an illusion!
I feel no pain?
Success!

As you step out of the dark room, you are blinded for a moment by the intense sunlight. And yet, things are different. You know things you didn't know before, and your view of the entire world has shifted. What you have attained in there can be nothing else but gnosis!
Eureka!
Success?

As you step out of the dark room, you are blinded for a moment by the intense sunlight. But other than that things feel... exactly the same. Did you do something wrong? Should you go back in the room? You can't really tell, but your gut is telling you that you didn't really learn anything.
Drat!

I shall join the Hermeticist school.
I shall join the Neoplatonist school.

The Minor Gods

This character is emulating the various minor gods of Ylijumala's realm. Many of these hail from the ancient Finnish pantheon and the reasons for their ascensions have long been forgotten, but as time has proven they are nonetheless worthy of veneration.
The Luther

This character is emulating Martin Luther, who Sisuists consider to be the father of their religion. He ascended to to divinity by fighting against tyranny, and his followers attempt to live lives of humility and charity to avoid bad sisu.
The Marshal

This character is emulating Marshal Mannerheim, who Sisuists consider to be the defender of their homes from Stalin the Devourer. Mannerheim proved that unyielding courage and a desire to protect can boost a man to divinity, and so his followers act as vigilantes and militiamen where needed.
The Founder

This character is emulating Kekkonen, who Sisuists consider the founder of Finland and the final nail of the dark forces of Stalin. Kekkonen during his rule revolutionised his lands in order to save Finland from obscurity. He is considered the patron of Finland and Finns everywhere owe their existence to his actions, so his followers attempt to emulate his charity and selflessness.
The White Death

This character is emulating the White Death, a pre-Event warrior known for his swiftness, silence, and the ability to kill in a split second without ever being discovered. Said to be a one man army, details of the White Death's life have been lost to time. However, all accounts of his tenacity in combat leave him remembered as the greatest warrior Finland has ever seen and therefore the very embodiment of sisu, becoming one of the most popular figures in Sisuism.
A Sect
As a adult Sisukkuus you must choose a way you will practice your faith.
I shall join the sects of the Minor Dieties.
I shall join the Luther Sect.
I shall join the Marshal Sect.
Show me more.
A Sect
As a adult Sisukkuus you must choose a way you will practice your faith.
I shall join the Founder Sect.
I shall join the White Death Sect.
Back to the beginning.
The Redcoats Embark

Having spent the last year gathering soldiers and preparing ships and supplies, the Redcoats are finally ready to embark on their voyage to America. The first ships left port this morning, following mariners' charts, and hope to report back within a few years.
We wish them a safe and speedy voyage
May they drown on the way
Who?
Fall of The Rockers

Word comes from the West! The Redcoats have landed in the place called 'Newfindland', it appears to be a large Island off the North East Coast of the Mainland. There, they have found but a squabbling bunch of barbarians, speaking strange dialects roughly reminiscent of the various languages of the British Isles, though such barbarians can't possibly speak the Queen's tongue. They have subjugated them, and brought them back under the Crown's dominion. Though the Rockers fought back, resistance was less than expected. Perhaps the reconquest of America is not such a far-fetched dream after all?
Rule Britannia!
The British are coming!
This is not our business
Excellent. Order them to go West along the great river
Excellent. Order them to focus on going South along the coastline
The Crawling Chaos

Word comes from the West! The Redcoats arrived in America several months ago, but to their great surprise, they discovered that the land of Newfindland was held by an enormous realm, stretching across onto the Canadian mainland. The ruler of this realm has rallied his warriors, and the Redcoat forces have been shattered. In disarray, they have been utterly wiped out.
What a disaster!
Ha! Serves them right!
And the weather report?
Reinforcements

The messengers who recently told us of the Redcoats' victories across the sea have also carried an appeal directly from the Lord-Admiral. It claims that, though their soldiers have fought bravely and victory was achieved, it was not achieved without substantial cost. America is obviously far more heavily populated than we had anticipated, and the Redcoats' arrival is sure to unite the troublesome colonials together in opposition to them. The Lord-Admiral therefore pleads for more supplies and soldiers to be sent to their new capital in Newfindland, warning that without reinforcements, future victory remains uncertain.
They shall have it. Load the ships!
They are just greedy cowards. What they have already is quite sufficient
You shouldn't tag over to e_redcoats, you know! This option is only for the AI, silly!
Redcoats land in the Mainland

The Redcoats fresh from their victory in Newfindland have decided to start their campaign in the mainland through taking the area known as 'New Brunswick', the Redcoats have met little organized resistance from the locals and what seems like a legation army from the American heartland. Now the Redcoats have confidently secured a beachhead in the American mainland and are ready to march south.
The ancient slight is avenged
Rule Britannia!
A Disastrous Repeat

The Redcoats have landed in the land known as 'New Brunswick' completely unopposed, but upon marching through the surroundings of the city of Moncton, they were ambushed by native forces and a few soldiers presumably from the American heartland, the Redcoats were caught by surprise in highly unfavourable terrain and were forced to surrender and retreat..
Are we sure they didn't just land in Scotland?
That...isn't good. At all
Mahabodhi

Mahabodhi or the Great Bodhi Tree was a huge tent term derived from pre Kali-Yuga organisations that coordinated communication between all sects of Buddhism in the subcontinent, but after the Event the connections between them were severed and so the term now refers to Theravada schools that are either still open to reconciliation between different schools, or simply didn't quite fit into any other defined school.
Bodhidharma

Bodhidharma or Rule of Bodhi is a radical strain of the Theravada school of Buddhism that believes unity and zeal will get them through the Kali-Yuga. They believe that the chaos and uncertainty of this era are brought about by the irresoluteness and sinful tendencies of their forefathers, which broke the foundation of human civilization and tore a rift for Mara to lay waste on the world of living. The adherents of this sect aim to be forthright and unrelenting in their zeal and are not afraid to wage war to uphold their moral codes.
Vispassana

Vipassana or Insight Meditation is an esoteric branch of Theravada that focuses on reaching the "bare insight" via rigorous meditation and becoming closer to enlightenment. Originating in Burma, most of its popularity stems from there.

column2: Phi Bun Creed

Phi Bun is a term for the spirits of ancient locally venerates heroes. These heroes may range from rebellion leaders to legitimate rulers. Generally, practitioners of the Phi Bun cult are considerably more superstitious than conventional Ariya Meitrai followers.
Kammathan Creed

Kammathan is an ancient school of Buddhism from Siam whose doctrine was focused on personal improvement and abandoning worldly possession in favour of pursuing enlightenment and becoming one with nature. Due to this, the Siamese readily rejected their teachings. After the Event, they reemerged again after the Sangha of Vientiane mercifully accepted them into the fold, but their reclusive nature has not made them popular among their fellow Ariya Meitrai.
Phloeng Padevat Creed

Phloeng Padevat or the Flame of Revolution are spiritual descendants of the Red Princes movement to restore peace and prosperity to the living world. While he may have failed his task, the Nak Padevat revolutionaries work tirelessly to better the life of the underprivileged and arm the oppressed in hope that one day Sri Ariya Meitrai will turn back the tide against all the evil in this world.

I shall follow the elusive way of Kammathana.

Shinsei Pure Land Sect

Pure Land Buddhism is a tradition which is primarily focused on achieving rebirth in Buddha's "pure land", some of which are considered to be superior places to spiritually train for full Buddhahood, since a Buddha has compassionately "purified" it for this purpose and one can meet a Buddha face to face and study under them. Due to this, many Mahayana Buddhists strive to be reborn in such a place.
Lotus Sect

The Lotus Sect believes that in order to rebuild a Buddhist society, one must proclaim their devotion to Buddha by chanting the very namesake of the sect, the lotus sutra and by bettering themselves through the teachings contained inside. They must also reject the heretical practice of worshipping local gods'' and solely devote oneself to Buddha. And lastly, they are obligated to save others from the path of darkness by steering them onto the righteous path.
Tendai Sect

Tendai is one of the Mahayana schools developed in China. This school emphasises the Lotus Sutra's doctrine of the "One Vehicle" (Ekayana) as well as the Madhyamaka philosophy, which is reflected in their version of Buddha. Their Buddha is without hierarchies and dualities, and one which is already entailed in everything.
Zen Sect

Zens teaching draws from numerous sources of Sarvastivada meditation practices, Mahayana thought and the Huayan school, with their emphasis on Buddha-nature, totality, and the Bodhisattva-ideal. It de-emphasises knowledge alone of sutras and doctrine, instead favouring direct understanding through spiritual practice and interaction with an accomplished teacher or master.

They believe that the fundamental human vice is selfishness, which is caused by the illusory belief in individual selves, and the fundamental human virtue is universal compassion, which is caused by the recognition that we are all parts of one transpersonal reality. Among the empires of Europe Transnistria is one of the only among them which can trace it's origins to before the event. It had taken many forms throughout the years, first a tribe under the legendary Smirnovescu chiefs. Then, after a brief period of foreign rule, the nistrenian people revolted and established a stratocratic republic, with revolting army's generals becoming the new rulers of the realm. The Nistrenian Republic grew far and wide, eventually encompassing the whole kingdom of moldavia. Though the stratocracy was eventually replaced by the Transnistrian Empire under the Saint Empress Adriana, the State still remained, growing in Size to eventually incorporate most of the lands from Danube and Carpathians on the west to Volga and Caucasus to the east. Destabilized and reduced thrice in size, with the Korol of Ukraine growing greater in strength.
